sentences.sentence: Sorry, I didn't mean to frighten you.
sentences.translation: 对不起，我没有吓唬你的意思。

sentences.sentence: He would never frighten anyone or cause them any harm.
sentences.translation: 他永远不会吓唬或伤害任何人。

sentences.sentence: All this was just designed to frighten me and keep me in line.
sentences.translation: 所有这一切只是设计来吓唬我、让我守规矩。
